#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

#define LL long long
const int MAXN = 1e5 + 10;
const LL MOD = 1e9 + 7;
LL dp[310][MAXN];
LL fac[310];
int main(){
    int t;
    int n,m;
    fac[0] = 1;
    for(int i = 1;i < 310;++i){
        fac[i] = (fac[i - 1] * i)%MOD;
    }
    for(int i = 1; i < 310;++i){
        dp[i][(i*(i+1))/2] = 1;
    }
    for(int i = 1;i < 310;++i){
        int ideal = (i * (i + 1))/2;
        for(int j = 1;j < MAXN;++j){
            if(j == ideal)
                continue;
            dp[i][j] = 0;
            if(j - i >= 0){
                dp[i][j] = ( dp[i][j] + dp[i - 1][j - i] + dp[i][j - i])%MOD;
            }
        }
    }
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--){
        scanf("%d%d",&n,&m);
        printf("%lld\n",(dp[n][m]*fac[n])%MOD );
    }

    return 0;
}
